#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int day[] = { 0, 37, 42, 29, 34, 51, 49 };

	int date, month, d = 1;

	scanf("%d %d", &date, &month);

	int foo = 1, temp, j;

	while (foo <= month)
	{
		temp = day[foo];
		j = 1;

		while (j <= temp)
		{
			if (foo == month)
			{
				if (j == date)
				{
					break;
				}
			}
			if (d == 6)
				d = 1;
				else
			d++;
			j++;
		}
		foo++;
	}

	printf("%d\n", d);

	return 0;
}
